title: Print, "Wings of the Lightning (Geischoni), No. 6", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Wings of the Lightning
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 6 / Geischoni.
description: A large red iris, the inner perianth leaves white above. Upper portion of stem, leaves, and bud, against a neutral background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Wings of the Lightning (Geischoni), No. 6", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.4 x 27.5 cm (15 7/8 x 10 13/16 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-61.
